data.eml:eml: Review of the Neotropical species of Nervijuncta Marshall, 1896 (Diptera, Ditomyiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Falaschi, Rafaela Lopes, Amorim, Dalton De Souza (2009): Review of the Neotropical species of Nervijuncta Marshall, 1896 (Diptera, Ditomyiidae). Zootaxa 2219: 18-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190017
